amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director of National Intelligence to create a pilot program for Historically Black Colleges and Universities to help develop critical language curricula and study abroad programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-75 to task the Director of National Intelligence with creating a pilot grant program for Historically Black Colleges and Universities to assist in creating and maintaining academic curricula that teach advanced critical foreign languages, and for study abroad programs. Amendment aims to help intelligence community meet strategic, diversity and critical language goals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barrow amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
